::Killfest::

Killfest nods, looking at the screen. He frowns as he sees Black 
Arachnia and Gremlin near his position in the base.

With an order through the internal communication system between his 
troops, EndBringer, Greven, Demise, and Scyther change course, 
heading for Black Arachnia and Gremlin.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Killfest, respond to him. Stall him as long as you can. Dark Mouse 
try
> to regain complete computer control."
> He opened a comm on incodded channels to his troops.
> "Both Megatron claims to have computer control, and he says he will
> destroy us with the enviormental systems. Although we have computer
> control, we cant take the chance. He might not be bluffing. Your 
orders
> are to attack them now. Hard and fast! Destroy them wile we still
> control the internal defences."
> He turned back to StarScream.
> "What do you say? Want to go kick some Megatron ass?"
